document.heading: District of Columbia Police and Fireman’s Salary Act Amendments of 1975

history.narrative: Law 1-73, the “District of Columbia Police and Fireman’s Salary Act Amendments of 1975,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 1-235, which was referred to the Committee on Public Services. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on March 9, 1976, and March 23, 1976, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on April 30, 1976, it was assigned Act No. 1-109 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
